info.title: Connected Vehicle
info.description: This API allows to get latest status, diagnostics and statistics data of a connected vehicle as well as providing functionalities to invoke designated actions towards the vehicle

post.description: Used to send an unlock command to the vehicle.

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId
parameters.description: A transaction unique id which can be used do identify the transaction in integrated systems

requestBody.description: Empty request body for this command.

requestBody.description: The points of interest (POIs) to add.

get.description: Provides all current valid relations between a Volvo Id (user) and its connected vehicles. Returns a list of VINs. Required Scope(s): conve:vehicle_relation

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId
parameters.description: A transaction unique id which can be used do identify the transaction in integrated systems

get.description: Provides details about the vehicle such as model, model-year etc. Required Scope(s): conve:vehicle_relation

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId
parameters.description: A transaction unique id which can be used do identify the transaction in integrated systems

get.description: Deprecated since v2. Will be removed in next version. Used to get a list of the active and past command-requests invoked against the vehicle.

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. number of the items to display in each result set. Default is 50

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: an identifier to for the next page of the result

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId
parameters.description: A transaction unique id which can be used do identify the transaction in integrated systems

get.description: Deprecated since v2. Will be removed in next version. Used to get the details of the command referenced by the id parameter.

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: request identifier generated by Connected-Vehicle-API when the request has been received.

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId
parameters.description: A transaction unique id which can be used do identify the transaction in integrated systems

get.description: Vehicle's network accessibility to send invocation commands, such as if vehicle is available and the date until it's accessible. If the vehicle is not available then i has gone into sleep mode and it's not possible to send commands towards the vehicle. To be able to do so you need to start the vehicle again.

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId

post.description: Deprecated since v2. Will be removed in next version. Used to perform an advanced search through the command-requests

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Format - int32. number of the items to display in each result set. Default is 50

parameters.description: an identifier to for the next page of the result

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId

requestBody.description: request model encapsulating search filters such as request-ids, start-date and end-date

get.description: Used to list the commands which can be sent to the vehicle

parameters.name: vin
parameters.description: Vehicle identifier (VIN)

parameters.name: vcc-api-operationId
parameters.description: A transaction unique id which can be used do identify the transaction in integrated systems

runtimeMinutes.description: Time in minutes engine will be running. Can be set to maximum 15 minutes

unlockDuration.description: Time in seconds that the doors can be unlocked. Can maximum be set to 120 seconds

accessToken.description: A valid access token from the Volvo ID account service. See the Authorisation Guide for details. The access token must have been issued on behalf of the current user.
